unnormalised: Arre baba, neurology mhontat? Mhaje nani AIIMS-ant Dr. Sharma-cher headache-akhatir geli. Magir kollun ailem ki tinnem chai piyeli nasli! Tannem tinka ek tablet dillem - Neurobion Forte mhuntat hanv chintam - ani thandd zaunk sanglam. 500mg chai kafi asa, doctor-an sanglam. Tannem mhonnlem tichem brain-ak caffeine miss zatalem, LOL. Mhonnche, tumchem brain kam korina zait zalear, tum MRI-cher Rs. 5000 karch korche adim, ektem borem adrak wali chai piyevn pollou! üòâ
normalised: arre baba, neurology? mazi nani A-I-I-M-S-ant doctor sharma-gele masta dok dukhta mhunn. tannem pollele ani taka chai nasli mhunn dislem! tannem ek tablet dile - neurobion forte astolem - ani chill kor mhunn sanglam. panchso milligram chai kamak yeteli, doctor sangta. taka caffeine naxili mhunn, L-O-L. mhunn, tumcha dok dukhtat zalear, masta adrak wali chai pyi ani magir rupee panch hazar M-R-I korta mhunn taka di.
